price: តើពួកគេមិនដឹងទេឬថា អល់ឡោះពិតជាដឹងនូវអ្វីៗ ដែលពួកគេលាក់កំបាំងនិងអ្វីៗដែលពួកគេលាតត្រដាង?
arabic: أَوَلَا يَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: awalā yaʿlamūna anna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna
